009package imagingbook.core.resource;
010
011import ij.IJ;
012import ij.ImagePlus;
013
014/**
015 * <p>
016 * Interface to be implemented by named image resources.
017 * This indicates (for testing) that the associated resource can be opened as
018 * an image (by ImageJ).
019 * Extends interface {@link NamedResource} by adding method {@link #getImage()},
020 * which returns an {@link ImagePlus} instance.
021 * For example, given a named resource {@code MyImages.image1},
022 * this can be used simply in the form
023 * </p>
024 * <pre>
025 * ImagePlus im = MyImages.image1.getImage();
026 * im.show();
027 * </pre>
028 * 
029 * @author WB
030 *
031 */
032public interface ImageResource extends NamedResource {
033        
034        public default ImagePlus getImage() {
035                return IJ.openImage(getURL().toString());
036        }
037
038}
